Uses of Package
org.semanticweb.vlog4j.core.reasoner.exceptions

  • Packages that use org.semanticweb.vlog4j.core.reasoner.exceptions 
    Package Description
    org.semanticweb.vlog4j.core.reasoner  
    org.semanticweb.vlog4j.core.reasoner.exceptions  
    org.semanticweb.vlog4j.core.reasoner.implementation  
    org.semanticweb.vlog4j.examples  
  • Classes in org.semanticweb.vlog4j.core.reasoner.exceptions used by org.semanticweb.vlog4j.core.reasoner 
    Class and Description
    EdbIdbSeparationException
    Exception thrown when attempting to load the reasoner with a knowledge base (facts and rules) that contains predicates that are both EDB (occur in facts) and IDB (occur in rule heads).
    IncompatiblePredicateArityException
    Expression thrown when attempting to load the reasoner with a knowledge base that contains facts from a DataSource (added with Reasoner.addFactsFromDataSource(Predicate, DataSource)), whose arity does not correspond to the arity of the Predicate the data source was added for.
    ReasonerStateException
    Thrown when an operation that is invalid in current reasoner state is attempted.
  • Classes in org.semanticweb.vlog4j.core.reasoner.exceptions used by org.semanticweb.vlog4j.core.reasoner.exceptions 
    Class and Description
    VLog4jException
    Top-level checked exception for VLog4j system.
  • Classes in org.semanticweb.vlog4j.core.reasoner.exceptions used by org.semanticweb.vlog4j.core.reasoner.implementation 
    Class and Description
    EdbIdbSeparationException
    Exception thrown when attempting to load the reasoner with a knowledge base (facts and rules) that contains predicates that are both EDB (occur in facts) and IDB (occur in rule heads).
    IncompatiblePredicateArityException
    Expression thrown when attempting to load the reasoner with a knowledge base that contains facts from a DataSource (added with Reasoner.addFactsFromDataSource(Predicate, DataSource)), whose arity does not correspond to the arity of the Predicate the data source was added for.
    ReasonerStateException
    Thrown when an operation that is invalid in current reasoner state is attempted.
  • Classes in org.semanticweb.vlog4j.core.reasoner.exceptions used by org.semanticweb.vlog4j.examples 
    Class and Description
